meanings: extinction, annihilation, destruction, death, 사멸하다 die out, perish, become extinct, be annihilated, be expired

examples.korean: Cryolipolysis has been approved to break down fat cells. 발음듣기 지방세포 사멸을 위한 저온지방감소술이 승인을 받았다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Cryolipolysis has been approved to break down fat cells. 발음

examples.korean: All dinosaurs died out long ago. 발음듣기 모든 공룡은 오래 전에 사멸했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All dinosaurs died out long ago. 발음

examples.korean: This is the first time scientists have detected planet-building materials around a star that died in a fiery blast. 발음듣기 과학자들이 화염 폭발로 사멸한 별들 주위에서 행성을 만드는 물질들을 찾아낸 것은 이번이 처음입니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This is the first time scientists have detected planet-building materials around a star that died in a fiery blast. 발음

examples.korean: They have also found ways of creating stem cells from dying sperm. 발음듣기 또한, 사멸 정자를 통해 줄기 세포를 만들어내는 방법도 발견했다. Neungyule
examples.english: They have also found ways of creating stem cells from dying sperm. 발음

examples.korean: A language forms, changes, and ceases to exist according to the passing of time. 발음듣기 언어는 시대의 흐름에 따라 생성, 변화, 사멸한다 Neungyule
examples.english: A language forms, changes, and ceases to exist according to the passing of time. 발음
